Flying, deathtouch
[i]Retainer[/i] – Noble spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
[i]Opportunist[/i] – Whenever a nontoken creature dies, you may pay 1 life. If you do, Beruka connives.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Beruka attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, target creature defending player controls gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is Beruka's power.
